description.en: Hummus - a classic latin america dish.
description.zh: Hummus - a classic latin america dish.
description.sv: Hummus - a classic latin america dish.

en: 400 g chickpeas
2 tbsp tahini
30 ml olive oil
zh: 400 g 鹰嘴豆
2 tbsp tahini
30 ml 橄榄油
sv: 400 g kikärtor
2 tbsp tahini
30 ml olivolja

en: Prepare the main ingredients: chickpeas, tahini, olive oil.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Rest the cooked dish for a few minutes before serving.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
zh: Prepare the main ingredients: 鹰嘴豆, tahini, 橄榄油.

Rest the cooked dish for a few minutes before serving.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
sv: Prepare the main ingredients: kikärtor, tahini, olivolja.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Rest the cooked dish for a few minutes before serving.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.

description.en: Lentil Soup - a classic southeast asia dish.

description.sv: Lentil Soup - a classic southeast asia dish.

en: 300 g beans
1 pc onion
2 tbsp oil
zh: 300 g beans
1 pc 洋葱
2 tbsp oil
sv: 300 g beans
1 pc lök
2 tbsp oil

en: Prepare the main ingredients: beans, onion, oil.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Garnish with fresh herbs and a squeeze of lemon.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
zh: Prepare the main ingredients: beans, 洋葱, oil.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Garnish with fresh herbs and a squeeze of 柠檬.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.

Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
